title: Faith
description: Let your faith be bigger than your fear

title: Life
description: Turn your wounds into wisdom - Oprah Winfrey

title: Point of View
description:
The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. 
The optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty - Winston Churchill

title: Actions
description:
If you achieve something good with hard work, the labour passes, but the good remains.

If you do something shameful for the sake of pleasure, the pleasure passes, but the shame remains.
